# GitHub Labels for FractalTrader

## Lifecycle Labels

- `idea` (purple) - Raw idea, needs analysis
- `needs-analysis` (yellow) - Waiting for Opus strategic breakdown
- `research` (blue) - Research task in progress
- `implementation` (green) - Coding work
- `review` (orange) - Code review needed
- `done` (gray) - Completed and merged

## Agent Assignment

- `opus-task` (red) - Strategic analysis, architectural decisions
- `sonnet-task` (cyan) - Integration, review, documentation
- `haiku-task` (pink) - Research, prototyping, data work

## Feature Areas

- `feature/smc` - Smart Money Concepts detection
- `feature/strategies` - Trading strategies
- `feature/risk` - Risk management
- `feature/backtest` - Backtesting engine
- `feature/live` - Live trading
- `feature/data` - Data layer
- `feature/ui` - User interface (Jupyter, dashboards)
- `feature/tribal` - Tribal weather analysis
- `feature/mcp` - Model Context Protocol integration

## Priority

- `priority/critical` - Production blocker
- `priority/high` - Important for current milestone
- `priority/medium` - Nice to have
- `priority/low` - Future consideration

## Effort

- `effort/S` - <4 hours
- `effort/M` - 4-16 hours (1-2 days)
- `effort/L` - >16 hours (2+ days)

## Special

- `good-first-issue` - Good for community contributors
- `help-wanted` - Need external input
- `breaking-change` - API/interface change
- `documentation` - Docs only
